com.foreach.across.modules.web.config.resources

Class ResourcesConfiguration.ResourceUrlProviderExposingInterceptorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.web.config.support.PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurerAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.web.config.resources.ResourcesConfiguration.ResourceUrlProviderExposingInterceptorConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurer
    Enclosing class:
    ResourcesConfiguration

    @Configuration(value="resourceUrlProviderExposingInterceptorConfiguration")
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="across.web.resources.versioning",
                       value="enabled",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
public static class ResourcesConfiguration.ResourceUrlProviderExposingInterceptorConfiguration
extends PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurerAdapter
    Configures the ResourceUrlProvider if versioning active. Ensures the interceptor is registered so all controllers have access to it.
